step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in this position.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you bring your hands toward your forehead.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding steady for 30 seconds is great. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
You're returning to the start smoothly. Keep up the good form, especially with your wrists.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and your elbows closer as you move your hands. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
